definition: body/life/oneself/personally/one's morality and conduct/the main part of a structure or body/pregnant/classifier for sets of clothes: suit, twinset/Kangxi radical 158
aspect particle indicating action in progress
to make known/to show/to prove/to write/book/outstanding
to touch/to come in contact with/to feel/to be affected by/to catch fire/to burn/(coll.) to fall asleep/(after a verb) hitting the mark/succeeding in

sentences.english: He was sitting there in striped pyjamas.
sentences.chinese: 他身著條紋睡衣褲坐在那兒。

sentences.english: The whole family were dressed up to the nines when they left for the wedding.
sentences.chinese: 全家人都身著盛裝去參加婚禮。

sentences.english: Both his hair and beard were dark. He walked behind the White- cowled Elder, and to his left.
sentences.chinese: 另一位身著黑袍，黑髮黑鬚，跟在白袍長老左後方。

sentences.english: People are well dressed on red-letter day.
sentences.chinese: 在喜慶的日子裏，人們身著盛裝。

sentences.english: Josh looks funny in that green suit.
sentences.chinese: 身著那套綠西裝的喬許看來很滑稽。

sentences.english: The groom wore the white dress uniform of Monaco's Carabinieri royal guard.
sentences.chinese: 新郎身著摩納哥皇家衛隊憲兵白色制服。

definition: hair worn in a bun or coil
cloth head covering worn by men in ancient times/headscarf (typically worn by women)/kerchief/turban
